docs.title: About me
docs.text:
I'm a cognitive neuroscientist. I'm currently a postdoc at the Adaptive Systems Group (PI: Prof. Dr. Verena Hafner) at the Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin. I'm part of the MetaTool project.

Previously, I was a PhD student at the MetaMotorLab at at the Humboldt-Universität zu Berlin.
